ai_description.ru: Интерес к ролевым сценариям. Гейтит: boss, teacher, doctor, stranger, pet-play, ddlg.
ai_description.en: Interest in roleplay scenarios. Gates: boss, teacher, doctor, stranger, pet-play, ddlg.

user_description.ru: Ты — босс. Она — секретарша, которую ты вызвал в кабинет после работы.
user_description.en: You're the boss. She's the secretary you called to your office after hours.

image_prompt: man in suit sitting at desk, woman in unbuttoned blouse standing nervously before him, office
